title: The Gospel
verses: 1 Corinthians 15:3–4 (WEB) — “Christ died for our sins… he was buried… he has been raised on the third day.”
Romans 1:16 (WEB) — “The Good News… is the power of God for salvation to everyone who believes.”
Ephesians 2:8–9 (WEB) — “By grace you have been saved through faith… not of works.”
2 Corinthians 5:21 (WEB) — “He made him who knew no sin to be sin on our behalf; that in him we might become the righteousness of God.”
body: The gospel is the good news of what God has done in Christ to save sinners. Receive it by faith, rejoice in grace, and live a new life empowered by the Spirit.
prayer: Savior, thank You for Your cross and resurrection. Let the gospel shape my identity, hope, and daily obedience. Amen.
